name: NSUserActivityDelegate
desc: The interface through which a user activity instance notifies its delegate of updates.

items.name: func userActivity(NSUserActivity, didReceive: InputStream, outputStream: OutputStream)
items.desc: Notifies the user activity delegate that an input and output streams are available to open.

items.name: func userActivityWasContinued(NSUserActivity)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the user activity was continued on another device.

items.name: func userActivityWillSave(NSUserActivity)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the user activity will be saved to be continued or persisted.
